itunes:subtitle:
Narrated by Abbe Opher.  The adventure begins as the crew of the Starship Rem heads to the planet Dorn in search of a sleep-inducing flower. 

This is a preview episode. Get the full episode, and many more, ad free, on our supporter's feed: https://getsleepy.com/support.
